questions.explanation: C++ is a compiled language that interacts more directly with hardware, whereas Python is an interpreted language with more overhead.

questions.q: Which data structure follows the Last-In-First-Out (LIFO) principle?
questions.explanation: A stack adds and removes elements from the same end, meaning the last item added is the first one to be removed.
Structured Query Language is the standard administrative language used to manage and manipulate relational databases.

questions.q: In web development, which language is primarily used for styling?
questions.explanation: While HTML provides the structure of a webpage, CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to control the visual presentation and layout.

questions.q: Which of these is a "Boolean" value?
questions.explanation: A Boolean represents one of two values: True or False, typically used for logical operations.
